languages.text: "Тогда бы встретились мы в иное время. Ибо сплетение нитей судьбы не изменит один поворот, сколь ни беги в противную сторону".
"Then we would have met at another time. For the tangle of fate's threads cannot be rearranged by one turn, however earnestly one may try to run in the opposite direction."
languages.original_text: "Тогда бы встретились мы в иное время. Ибо сплетение нитей судьбы не изменит один поворот, сколь ни беги в противную сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Then we would have met at another time. For a single turn cannot rearrange the tangle of fate's threads, however one may try to run in the opposite direction."
"Then we would have met at another time. For a single turn cannot rearrange the tangle of fate's threads, however one may try to run in the opposite direction."
"Then we would have met at another time. For the tangle of fate's threads cannot be rearranged by one turn, however earnestly one may try to run in the opposite direction."
"Then we would have met at another time. For the tangle of fate's threads cannot be rearranged by one turn, however earnestly one may try to run in the opposite direction."
"Then we would have met at another time. For the tangle of fate's threads cannot be rearranged by one turn, however earnestly one may try to run in the opposite direction."

languages.text: "Dann wären wir uns zu einer anderen Zeit begegnet. Denn das Gewirr der Fäden des Schicksals lässt sich nicht durch eine einzige Kehrtwende neu anordnen, so sehr man sich auch bemüht, in die entgegengesetzte Richtung zu laufen."
languages.original_text: "Then we would have met at another time. For the tangle of fate's threads cannot be rearranged by one turn, however earnestly one may try to run in the opposite direction."

traits.locale_text: "Dann wären wir uns zu einer anderen Zeit begegnet. Denn das Gewirr der Fäden des Schicksals lässt sich nicht durch eine einzige Kehrtwende neu anordnen, so sehr man sich auch bemüht, in die entgegengesetzte Richtung zu laufen."

languages.text: «En ese caso, nos habríamos encontrado en otra ocasión, pues la maraña de los hilos del destino no puede reorganizarse con un giro, por más que se intente correr en dirección opuesta».
languages.original_text: "Then we would have met at another time. For the tangle of fate's threads cannot be rearranged by one turn, however earnestly one may try to run in the opposite direction."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, nos habríamos encontrado en otra ocasión, pues la maraña de los hilos del destino no puede reorganizarse con un giro, por más que se intente correr en dirección opuesta».

languages.text: 「それなら、また別の機に出会うこととなるだろう。運命の糸のもつれは、どんなに必死に反対側に走ろうとしたところで、一回で組み変えることはできないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Then we would have met at another time. For the tangle of fate's threads cannot be rearranged by one turn, however earnestly one may try to run in the opposite direction."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、また別の機に出会うこととなるだろう。運命の糸のもつれは、どんなに必死に反対側に走ろうとしたところで、一回で組み変えることはできないのだ」

languages.text: “那我们就会在另一个时间见面，因为哪怕您再怎么想朝相反的方向奔跑，纠缠在一起的命运丝线也不会那么容易便四散而开。”
languages.original_text: "Then we would have met at another time. For the tangle of fate's threads cannot be rearranged by one turn, however earnestly one may try to run in the opposite direction."

traits.locale_text: “那我们就会在另一个时间见面，因为哪怕您再怎么想朝相反的方向奔跑，纠缠在一起的命运丝线也不会那么容易便四散而开。”

languages.text: « Notre rencontre s'en serait simplement trouvée ajournée. Car on a beau s'efforcer de courir dans la direction opposée, on ne peut altérer l'écheveau des fils du destin. »
languages.original_text: "Then we would have met at another time. For the tangle of fate's threads cannot be rearranged by one turn, however earnestly one may try to run in the opposite direction."

traits.locale_text: « Notre rencontre s'en serait simplement trouvée ajournée. Car on a beau s'efforcer de courir dans la direction opposée, on ne peut altérer l'écheveau des fils du destin. »
